location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Draft letter from Lewis Pelly, to Charles Alison

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the recent decision of the Persian Foreign Office that all individuals of an 'exceptional character' must have a character reference signed by a competent authority before they can work for the Residency and the objectionable conduct of the Foreign Office Moonshee [Munshi] in Bushire.The letter has been written in pencil and contains a number of crossings out and corrections in both pencil and ink.
